notes: Script requires a KO list and an exp list to be created and uploaded to BlueGem
The script uses Slurm to manage the simulations
The script uses MATLAB to run the simulations and analysis
The script uses FileZilla to download the results from BlueGem
The script uses a specific directory structure for the output files
The script requires specific files to be present in the WholeCell-master directory
The script requires the user to have access to the BlueGem Supercomputer
